import React from "react"; import Logo from "../../images/logo.png"; import LogoDark from "../../images/logo-dark.png"; import PageContainer from "../../layout/page-container/PageContainer"; import Head from "../../layout/head/Head"; import AuthFooter from "./AuthFooter"; import { FormGroup, Button } from "reactstrap"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; const ForgotPassword = () => { return (
